title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.8 - Prohibited area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.8 - Prohibited area

State Regulations

No vehicle shall pass through a public passenger ramp and
apron area or public ramp and apron area in the section in use for the
enplaning and boarding or deplaning and debarking of passengers at
grade. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
